ac8d1df0-5b44-3206-bf6d-98ac94b1bcfb: A group of resource assignments is used to oversee the connections between several human resources and a single task. It consists of multiple instances of the human resource assignment class and includes functions to add or delete human resource assignments.
1eb5d0be-e6d4-3b7b-8822-698d52f8fea8: A GUI class for task properties offers an interface and functionality to manage dependencies, allowing the addition and removal of dependencies through an object of the dependency collection.
574913db-1deb-3e2d-816d-7963f76d9716: A GUI class for the graphical area includes a function to draw dependencies, utilizing an object from the task manager to add these dependencies.
09061a34-5626-3209-a334-3d0285181cf1: When a task is deleted, the GanttProject class interacts with the GanttTreeTableNode and DefaultMutableTreeNode classes to determine the parent of the task being removed.
cdbf0306-f0de-3a1a-aa84-3042917d9928: A milestone is a task that has no duration and is defined solely by its specific point in time.
8e097392-8792-3cbb-9fbd-809eeeddc4b8: A dependency class includes a dependant task and a dependee task. It offers methods to retrieve the dependant task and the dependee task. Additionally, the dependency class holds a constraint indicating the nature of the dependency.
